projects.name: Job Search Website
projects.desc: Using a pre-built API, I worked in a scrum team to build a job search website. The site utilised Tailwind, React, and Javascript. I developed distinct components to showcase recent jobs, related jobs, and individual job details. The website also features a search bar function enabling users to filter by job title or company name to interact with the back-end API.

projects.name: Blog Post Website
projects.desc: Using provided front-end code, I worked in a scrum team to develop a blog post website with PHP. The site was built following OOP design patterns and various handlers to streamline and organise the code. The website employs MySQL queries for selecting, filtering, joining, and ordering to display blog posts. Additionally, the site implements a login and registration system built from scratch, incorporating password verification to interact with the database, along with a likes and dislikes functionality. The site has also been checked with Unit Tests for the relevant methods.

projects.name: Card Collector App
projects.desc: The card collector app is a personal project to practice PHP concepts and skills. The app is intended to keep a wallet of digital sports cards to show off to friends and family. The site is built using PHP and mySQL to display cards from the database. The cards collection can also be filtered by sport. Within the collection a user can add cards to the site, edit details of existing cards, and remove cards from the collection.
